body_html:
What's the state of this PR ?
I would really love to see this fixed, because I'm solving a lot of linear systems with conjugate gradient, so my bottleneck is really the sparse x dense multiplication. The amount of time lost by converting the coo to csr makes my application not very tractable unfortunately...

body:
What's the state of this PR ?
I would really love to see this fixed, because I'm solving a lot of linear systems with conjugate gradient, so my bottleneck is really the sparse x dense multiplication. The amount of time lost by converting the coo to csr makes my application not very tractable unfortunately...
